translations: n.运输者；传达者；办理不动产等让与事务者

phrs.translation: 运输者, 产权转让, 转让人, 传达者

sentences.sentence: Character is image itself. When an image ACTS as a conveyancer of another image, it then completes its own writing. However, this depends on how we treat them.
sentences.translation: 文字本身也即图像，当一个图像作为另一图像的传达者时，它便完成了自身的写作，而这取决于我们如何对待它们。
